svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.5 Chrome/126.0.6478.183 Electron/31.3.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.5"> <diagram id="6a731a19-8d31-9384-78a2-239565b7b9f0" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="637" dy="393" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="827" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="2" value="开始" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="260" y="60" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="4" value="<span style="background-color: initial;">USART初始化</span><div><span style="background-color: initial;">SPI初始化</span></div><div><span style="background-color: initial;">TIMER初始化</span></div>" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.data;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="241" y="640" width="159" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-70" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5" target="6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5" value="更新采样波形<div>更新状态信息</div>" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.data;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="239.5" y="374" width="159" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-63" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" target="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-62"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="340" y="548.26" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="471" y="548.26" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-66" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="6" target="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-64"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6" value="按键状态检测" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="270.5" y="520" width="98" height="57" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7" style="fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#006EAF;strokeWidth=1;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;" parent="1" source="2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="130" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="12" value="" style="edgeStyle=elbowEdgeStyle;elbow=horizontal;fontColor=#001933;fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#006EAF;strokeWidth=1;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;" parent="1" source="6" target="4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" height="100" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="0.5" y="230" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="100.5" y="130" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="14" value="no" style="text;fontStyle=0;html=1;strokeColor=#006EAF;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeWidth=2;align=center;fontColor=#ffffff;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320.5" y="577" width="40" height="26" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40" value="end" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;strokeWidth=2;gradientColor=none;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="271" y="1140" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="43" value="" style="edgeStyle=elbowEdgeStyle;elbow=vertical;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryPerimeter=0;fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#003366;strokeWidth=1;html=1;" parent="1" target="40" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="100" height="100" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="331" y="1040" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="111" y="-770" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-68" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-60" target="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-67"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-60" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">RCC初始化</span><div><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">GPIO初始化</span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="130" width="160" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-62" value="按键状态检测" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="480.5" y="570" width="98" height="57" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-64" value="按键状态检测" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60.5" y="570" width="98" height="57" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-69" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-67" target="5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-67" value="<span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">配置USART</span><div><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">配置TIMER</span><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;"><br></span><div><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">配置SPI</span></div><div><span style="text-wrap: nowrap;">配置ADC</span></div></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="239.5" y="240" width="160" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-73" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-71" target="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-72"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-71" value="TIMER15中断" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="840" y="310" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-75" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-72"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="900" y="542.5000000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-72" value="更新程序状态标识<div>100ms</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="830" y="410" width="140" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-76" value="结束" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#006EAF;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="840" y="540" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-77" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;" edge="1" parent="1" source="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-78" target="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-80"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-78" value="KEY03中断" style="shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;html=1;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1080" y="307.5" width="120" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="lPfVvNtbYW3miDluu79X-80" value="PWM调制" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;gradientDirection=north;fontStyle=0;fillColor=#1ba1e2;strokeColor=#006EAF;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1070" y="410" width="140" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
